Name: Evil Ritual - Horror Escape
About the game: Evil Ritual is a small first-person horror game. You woke up in a cold and scary dungeon, and you don't know how you got there. After examining the situation and finding an old lamp, you try to get out, but you meet on your way: screamers, notes and various objects. Later, you realize that you have become part of an evil ritual! Key features: excellent optimization screamers mini-games reading notes (optional) use of items atmospheric music translated into 7 languages Steam achievements
